title: Better Choices: A Novel
description: Joya Alexander is a young, savvy, successful professional woman experiencing life and love and parallel trials and lessons. Joya survives corporate politics within a prominent law firm in a major metropolitan city, turns a perceived adverse corporate act into an opportunity to step outside of her comfort zone and to prove herself in the business world. Despite her professional accomplishments and success, she is anxious for a loving relationship to enhance her life. Her desires and decisions of her heart lead her down a path of twists and turns that she never imagined. Readers will laugh, cry and see themselves in Joya and the realness of her story.
author: Elle Nora
